def formula(person, period, parameters):
    """Calculate Disability Allowance eligibility amount."""
    # Retrieve the values of the input variables
    disability_allowance_eligible = person("disability_allowance_eligible", period)

    # Retrieve the values of the parameters
    disability_allowance_benefit = parameters(period).disability_allowance_benefit

    # Return the benefit amount if eligible, 0 otherwise
    return where(disability_allowance_eligible, disability_allowance_benefit, 0)
